name: Salade Niçoise
description: A salad with tuna, eggs, and vegetables such as tomatoes, green beans, and olives.

name: Frisée aux Lardons
description: A salad with frisée lettuce, bacon, and a warm poached egg.

name: Caesar Salad
description: French version of the classic salad invented by Caesar Cardini in Tijuana, Mexico in 1924

name: Salade de Betterave
description: A salad made with cooked beets, often combined with other ingredients such as goat cheese, walnuts, or arugula.

name: Salade de Chevre chaud
description: A warm salad made with goat cheese, often combined with other ingredients such as mixed greens, tomatoes, or bacon.

name: Salade de Poulet
description: A salad made with chicken, often combined with other ingredients such as mixed greens, tomatoes, or bacon.
